page.title: 05The Welbeck Estate Company
page.content: Welbeck Estate Co.is a private company developed from the estate of the Dukes of Portland whose present head is Lady Anne Bentinck,the daughter of the last duke.It invests in stocks and shares , shops and mines etc.and is also the major land owner in the Cuckney area. Since much of the Estate's local land comprises of forest plantations and farmland ,limestone lodges were built to house gamekeepers and other estate workers. The Estate now employs about 120 people and because of this and its role of landlord to a large number of people in the area ,it is held in great respect in the Norton/Cuckney vicinity. Lady Anne ,like her ancestors,takes an active interest in the community ,and the benevolent if rather eccentric ways of the last Duke are well known.
